task_list.instruction_title:
Purge Previous Migration Files + LIVE + LOG (with user migsup)

SCRIPT : [axvgvatxbEV301p:/home/migsup/tools/03_Purge_LIVE_LOG.ksh](http://axvgvatxbEV401p/home/migsup/tools/purge_files_PFU.ksh)
Refresh last version program (include code fix from RUN 1)

CODE-TYPE-RISK update in system code
Transaction UT01 (macro)

**TECHNICAL BROKER**
Check the existance of the technical broker : 001/3203608 302/3203608 303/3203608 304/3203608 305/3203608

Transaction : EN21 with office 001 and Param : A3203608

Transaction : EN21 with office 303 and Param : A3203608
Transaction : EN21 with office 304 and Param : A3203608

**Deposit Mapping (TB100)**
Recovery from the business of the latest deposit mapping

**Price for contracts Future migration (TB111) → PAS DE FUTURES POUR VICTORIA - SEULEMENT IRS**

N/A POUR LE RUN2


Recovery from the business deposits and price to use

MANDATORY FOR THE PROCESS : securities position migration

**DELIVERY INSTRUCTIONS (DEPOT CONFIGURATION)**
> Check if delivery instructions exist for technical broker with Transaction **SD85**
> Soc 001 Dept 19600 Broker 3203608 ==> Delivery instruction present

MANDATORY FOR THE PROCESS : Deposit instructions.

**DELIVERY INSTRUCTIONS (PLACE OF SETTLEMENT CONFIGURATION)**

Check with Business team data on SPITAB SDTPSET1 parameters for broker used for migration
All new segregated deposit must be reported in SDTPSET1 
Create them if it's not done (Per Broker / deposits) as follow

A*NUMERO DEPOT      ........ xxxxx-  
B*NUMERO BROKER............. 9999999-
C*NUMERO PLACE BOU.RSE...... 999-    

Transaction SPI2 or SQL Query
MANDATORY FOR THE PROCESS : deposits instructions (SWIFT messages)
Check the availability of BIC code SG in T_SEPA_BANK_DIRECT table (provide the extract)« select * from NHDBO.T_SEPA_BANK_DIRECT t where t.Code_Bic11_1099 like '%RUEGCHZZXXX%'  »```

**DELIVERY INSTRUCTIONS (TRADE DATE & SETTLEMENT DATE CONFIGURATION)**
Check with business Team (SWIFT MT-540 messages deposit output) on SPITAB SYTGBL01.
Create them if it's not done by transaction SPI2.
MANDATORY FOR THE PROCESS : deposits instructions (SWIFT messages)

**DELIVERY INSTRUCTIONS (TRADE DATE & SETTLEMENT DATE CONFIGURATION)**
Check with business Team for the last directives on SPITAB SYTGBL01.
Create them if it's not done Transaction SPI2.

**DELIVERY INSTRUCTIONS (TRADE DATE & SETTLEMENT DATE CONFIGURATION)**
Verify correspondance table for the value dates (SWIFT MT-540 messages) on SPITAB SYTGBL01.
Create them if it's not done by transaction SPI2.
MANDATORY FOR THE PROCESS deposits instructions (SWIFT messages)

**Verify if Counterpart accounts exist. **

For client 302 2000027, accounts must be exist in category 4159 + 9711
For client 303 2000015, accounts must be exist in category 4159 + 9711
For client 304 2000015, accounts must be exist in category 4159 + 9711
For client 305 2000015, accounts must be exist in category 4159 + 9711

Create FUSIGMA repository folder in EOS for saving EFU reports.
